Content.Question:
Come to Bath!
With its famous Roman baths and traditional old buildings, Bath is one of the most attractive cities in Britain. It was a very fashionable place for people to visit in the eighteenth century.
You can enjoy walking round the city with its many interesting museums, old shops and street markets. You can also go see the city from a boat cruise on the River Avon. The country around the city is beautiful and you can have a picnic on one of the peaceful hills nearby.
The city centre is lively in the evenings, with clubs and pubs and there are a lot of restaurants which are good value for money. They aren’t too expensive and they serve delicious food.
There are excellent hotels with comfortable rooms and friendly owners. Parking is very difficult especially in summer with all the tourists, so don’t bring your car. The city isn’t big and it’s easy to see everything on foot.
